Dynamice SQL in Procedure using value of internal variable
Main Success Scenario:
  1. see code below
  
    DROP PROCEDURE IF EXISTS TST_PRC();
    CREATE PROCEDURE TST_PRC ()
      RETURNS STRING
      LANGUAGE SQL
    AS 
    $$
    declare
       QRY STRING;
       OUTPUT STRING DEFAULT '';
       MY_VAR STRING;
    begin
        MY_VAR := 'chese';
        QRY := 'SELECT ' || MY_VAR;
        RETURN :QRY;
    end;
    $$;
    CALL TST_PRC();

  
Dynamic SQL in Procedure using default of internal variable
Main Success:
  1. see code below
  
    DROP PROCEDURE IF EXISTS TST_PRC();
    CREATE PROCEDURE TST_PRC ()
      RETURNS STRING
      LANGUAGE SQL
    AS 
    $$
    declare
       QRY STRING;
       OUTPUT STRING DEFAULT '';
       MY_VAR STRING DEFAULT 'CHEESE';
    begin
        QRY := 'SELECT ' || MY_VAR;
        RETURN :QRY;
    end;
    $$;
    CALL TST_PRC();
